title: It’s Clearly South Carolina’s Time. Here’s How Dawn Staley Crafted It.
description: The South Carolina coach’s teams have proved themselves over and over, and the players have enough comfort together to play like “shorthand writing.”
dc:creator: Remy Tumin
media:description: Dawn Staley and South Carolina beat UConn on Sunday night to win their second N.C.A.A. women’s title.
